about_the_game:
* In the demo you can play a short part of the main story.

A new stage begins. The trip to a new city, meeting new friends and enjoying a good read. Yukiko manages to enter the prestigious Aoi Academy for young ladies and here she will meet her future partner.

Yukiko will share her day to day life with her friends and every day will seem unique in her eyes. From working in a cafeteria, to reading romance novels in a quiet place at the academy.

"Welcome to Aoi Ladies' Academy."

Credits

  • temporal backgrounds: Minikle, NoranekoGames and Selavi Games
  • song: Souichi Sakagami(Trial & Error) and Kevin MacLeod
  • temporal Sprites: NoranekoGames
  • English Translation: Suki
  • Spanish & English Proofreading: Suki
  • English Proofreading: MaryZ
detailed_description:
* In the demo you can play a short part of the main story.

A new stage begins. The trip to a new city, meeting new friends and enjoying a good read. Yukiko manages to enter the prestigious Aoi Academy for young ladies and here she will meet her future partner.

Yukiko will share her day to day life with her friends and every day will seem unique in her eyes. From working in a cafeteria, to reading romance novels in a quiet place at the academy.

"Welcome to Aoi Ladies' Academy."

Credits

  • temporal backgrounds: Minikle, NoranekoGames and Selavi Games
  • song: Souichi Sakagami(Trial & Error) and Kevin MacLeod
  • temporal Sprites: NoranekoGames
  • English Translation: Suki
  • Spanish & English Proofreading: Suki
  • English Proofreading: MaryZ

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game can be run on all Debian-based Linux distributions.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64bit only), Intel Only
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Errors have been detected with macOS 13, so execution may fail.

name: Roses Of Love Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 series, AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system required

short_description: In this visual novel you will be immersed in the story of Akane, a girl who wanted to fulfill her dream of studying in the great city of Tokyo. Here Akane will find love and new friendships, support her in her search for romance and discover a side of her that never expected.
